Welcome to Pyomic's documentation!
==================================

``Pyomic`` is a python library for omics included RNA-seq and scRNA-seq

To get started with ``Pyomic``, check out the `Installation <Installation_guild.md>`_ and `tutorials <Tutorials/Tutorials.rst>`_.

For more details about the Pyomic framework, please check out our `publication <none>`_

   Developer_guild.md
